HomeAlone.business

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • HomeAlone.business.Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains methods and attributes for a room.

    • Method Detail

      • getRoomID

        public int getRoomID()
        Getter method for the attribute roomID
        Returns:
        integer value containing the room id

      • setRoomID

        public void setRoomID(int roomID)
        Setter method for the attribute roomID.
        Parameters:
        roomID - int

      • addItem

        public void addItem(Item item)
        Adds an item to the rooms inventory. This method adds an item to the List that is used as the rooms inventory.
        Parameters:
        item - Item object

      • getItemList

        public java.util.List<Item> getItemList()
        Returns a list of available items in the room. This method returns a List of Items that is used as the rooms inventory.
        Returns:
        List of Item objects

      • getItems

        public java.lang.String getItems()
        Returns the inventory as a string of item names. This method returns a string of item names, build using the List that is used as the rooms inventory.
        Returns:
        String of item names

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem(Item item)
        Removes an item from the rooms inventory. This method removes an item from the List that is used as the rooms inventory.
        Parameters:
        item - Item object

      • getItemString

        public java.lang.String getItemString()
        Same functionality as getItems().
        Returns:
        String of item names

      • getTrapString

        public java.lang.String getTrapString()
        Returns a string with the name of all the possible traps for the room. This method returns a string that contains all the traps it is possible to set up in the room.
        Returns:
        empty string, or string of item names

      • getRealItem

        public Item getRealItem(java.lang.String itemName)
        Returns the Item object. This method return the Item object that has the item name provided.
        Parameters:
        itemName - String
        Returns:
        null or an Item object

      • setExit

        public void setExit(java.lang.String direction,
                    Room neighbor)
        Adds an exit to the HashMap of exits set on the room. This method adds a new exit to the HashMap that contains the exits for the room. It is only called during the initialisation of the game.
        Parameters:
        direction - String
        neighbor - Room object

      • getShortDescription

        public java.lang.String getShortDescription()
        Returns the short description of the room. This method returns the short description that is specified in the class constructor.
        Returns:
        string

      • getLongDescription

        public java.lang.String getLongDescription()
        Returns the short description of the room and a list of exits. This method returns the short description that is specified in the class constructor as well as a list of available exits in the form of a string.
        Returns:
        String

      • getExitString

        public java.lang.String getExitString()
        Returns a list of exits as a string. This method returns the keys from the HashMap of available exits as a comma separated string.
        Returns:
        String

      • getExit

        public Room getExit(java.lang.String direction)
        Returns the object associated with a specific exit. This method returns the Room object that is associated with the given string. The association is in the HashMap.
        Parameters:
        direction - String
        Returns:
        Room object

      • setInfo

        public void setInfo(java.lang.String info)
        Setter method for the attribute info.
        Parameters:
        info - String

      • getInfo

        public java.lang.String getInfo()
        Getter method for the attribute info.
        Returns:
        String

      • getNumberOfExits

        public int getNumberOfExits()
        Returns the amount of exits in the room. This method returns the amount of exits available in the room.
        Returns:
        integer value containing the number of available exits

      • getExitFromIndex

        public java.lang.String getExitFromIndex(int index)
        Possible future usage. This method was meant to be used in case the nonplayer entities would be reprogrammed to use a random path and not the fixed paths they are using currently.
        Parameters:
        index - int
        Returns:
        Room object

      • checkTrapSet

        public java.lang.String checkTrapSet()
        Checks inventory for set traps. This method checks the inventory to see if there are any traps set. if there are it returns the name of the trap, if not then it returns an empty string.
        Returns:
        string

      • checkTraps

        public Trap checkTraps()
        Returns the Trap if one is set. This method returns the Trap object for a trap that have been set in the room or null if no traps have been set.
        Returns:
        Trap object or null

      • defineTrap

        public void defineTrap(Item item)
        Adds a trap to the list of possible traps in the room. This method adds a Trap to the List of possible traps that can be set up in a room.
        Parameters:
        item - Item object

      • getPossibleTraps

        public java.util.List<Trap> getPossibleTraps()
        Returns the list of possible traps. This method returns a list of possible traps that can be set up in the room.
        Returns:
        List of traps or null
